component.name: QBZ
component.summary: Native Qobuz client with hi-res audio support

description.p: QBZ is a native Qobuz streaming client for Linux designed for audiophiles who demand the highest audio quality.

ul.li: Bit-perfect playback up to 24-bit/192kHz without browser limitations
Native hi-res audio support with ALSA, PulseAudio, and PipeWire backends
Advanced audio routing and exclusive mode for DACs
Beautiful, responsive interface optimized for music discovery
Offline playlist support for on-the-go listening
Radio Engine for infinite music discovery based on your favorite artists
Smart recommendations powered by local machine learning
MPRIS integration for desktop media controls

description.p: Built with Tauri and Rust for optimal performance and reliability.
Maintenance release: faster Home view, playback auto-resume after settings change, playlist import improvements, and bug fixes.
Major release: genre filtering, playlist suggestions, immersive player, DAC wizard, key bindings, artist blacklist.
